#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	
	int answer[10][4]={{0,0,0,0},{1,1,1,1},{2,4,8,6},{3,9,7,1},{4,6,4,6},{5,5,5,5}	,{6,6,6,6},{7,9,3,1},{8,4,2,6},{9,1,9,1}};
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	while(n--)
	{
		long long n,p;
		scanf(" %Ld %Ld",&n,&p);
		if(p==0)
			printf("1\n");
		else
			printf("%d\n",answer[n%10][(p+3)%4]);
	}
	return 0;
}
